name: Name
tosecdesc: The Old School Emulation Center (TOSEC) is a retrocomputing initiative dedicated to the cataloging and preservation of software, firmware and resources for arcade machines, microcomputers, minicomputers and video game consoles. The main goal of the project is to catalog and audit various kinds of software and firmware images for these systems.
nointrodesc: No-Intro catalogs the best available copies of ROMs and digital games, providing DAT files for ROM managers and an online database.
progettodesc: Provides DATs for MAME and MESS.
automatictoomanymatches: Too many results to automatically match

passwordnotcomplex:
Your password is not complex enough. It should contain:

  • at least 1 upper case letter
  • at least 1 numerica character
  • at least one special character ( $ @ # & ~ )

deleteaccountdescription: Once you delete your account, your email address and password are permanently removed from Hasheous.
